contentrichtext.text: {{About|the voice actress|the personal trainer and television personality|Jillian Michaels (personal trainer)}} {{Infobox person | image = | name = Jillian Michaels | birth_name = | birth_date = Unknown | birth_place = [[Vancouver]], [[British Columbia]] | age = Unknown | death_date = | death_place = | occupation = Voice Actress | alias = | gender = Female | credits = ''[[InuYasha]]'' <br>as '''[[Shippo]]'''<br> ''[[Dragon Ball Z]]'' <br>as '''[[Son Goten]]'''<br>''[[Gundam SEED]] and<br>[[Gundam SEED Destiny]]''<br>as '''[[Lacus Clyne]]'s singing voice''' }} '''Jillian Michaels''' is a Canadian [[voice actor|voice actress]] who has done [[Dubbing (filmmaking)|English dubs]] of [[Japanese anime]] like ''[[InuYasha]]'', ''[[Hamtaro]]'', and ''[[Silent Möbius]]''. She is also the singing voice of [[Lacus Clyne]] in ''[[Gundam Seed]]'' and ''[[Gundam Seed Destiny]]''. ==Voice roles== * ''[[Dragonball Z]]'' - [[Son Gohan]] ([[Cell Games Saga]], [[The Ocean Group]] dub), [[Son Goten]] (The Ocean Group dub) * ''[[Edgar & Ellen]]'' - Ellen * ''[[Gundam SEED]]'' - [[Lacus Clyne]]'s singing voice * ''[[Gundam SEED Destiny]]'' - Lacus's singing voice, [[Meer Campbell]]'s singing voice * ''[[Gundam 00]]'' - Linda Vashti, Revive Revival * ''[[Hamtaro]]'' - Panda, Stucky, Haibi * ''[[InuYasha]]'' - [[Shippo]], Kaede (young), Princess Tsuyu, Yuka * ''[[MegaMan NT Warrior]]'' - Princess Pride * ''[[Ōban Star-Racers]]'' - Ning * ''[[SoulTaker]]'' - Yuko * ''[[Project ARMS]]'' - Al Bowen * ''[[Brain Powered]]'' - Quincy Issa, Iiko Isami * ''Ronin Warriors: Gaiden'' (OVA) - Runa, Newscaster * ''[[Master Keaton]]'' - Hanna * ''[[Mix Master]]'' - Cheek * ''[[Bratz Fashion Pixiez]]'' - Dee * ''[[Ricky Sprocket: Showbiz Boy]]'' - Ricky Sprocket * ''[[My Little Pony: A Charming Birthday]]'' - Razzaroo * ''[[Powerpuff Girls Z]]'' - Buttercup's Mom, Justin * ''[[Quest for Zhu]]'' - Jilly * ''[[Lego Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu|LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu]]'' - [[Lloyd Garmadon]]<ref name="Ninjago">{{cite web |url=http://ninjas.brickcraft.me/index.php?title=Lloyd_Garmadon&oldid=1633 |title=Lloyd Garmadon - The Ninjago Wiki |accessdate=12 January 2012 }}</ref> == References == <references/> {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Michaels, Jillian | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = [[Vancouver]], [[British Columbia]] | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Michaels, Jillian}} [[Category:Canadian voice actresses]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Actresses from Vancouver]] [[Category:Year of birth missing (living people)]]
